Text.Page: Laaran and Himmul are investigating the crystallization, trying to find a solution.

If your Raider friend is telling the truth, we must stop the spread of this powder.

Himmul is also investigating the powder.
I want you to help him.

Go and speak with him.

Hello, . I wish we had better circumstances for this reunion.

With your help, I'm certain we'll solve the mystery of this amber powder."I'll do anything I can."

Your help is very much appreciated.

Hmm... We'll need samples from as many affected creatures as possible.

Blackhoof Unicorns and Smokepaw Timberwolfs were the first reported cases of transformation. Start there, and bring the samples back as soon as you can.

This crystallization terrifies me. At any moment, this whole town could be obliterated, and there's nothing I can do about it.

, did you have any luck collecting more samples?"I did."

That was quick!

Next, we'll need samples from Loamy Sporewalkers. They have a unique biology, unlike anything else in this province. Running tests on multiple sources at once will speed our process.

You can find some near the Silent Hills region.

Good work, . I just wish I had better news for you.

What I can tell you is that the Red Raiders are telling the truth.

If any living organism is exposed to this powder, it will first experience severe pain, then pass out or become dormant.

The effects are similar to a poison, only that this one doesn't have an antidote."Is there nothing we can do?"

Not at the moment. I need more time...

Please let the Magistrate know I'm still searching for a cure.

Is there no way to stop it? The powder drifts are getting worse as we speak.

How much time do we have left?
"No one knows."

I can't just sit here and let everyone die...

Thank you for your help, .
